Open 'https://www.example.com/'
Verify the hero image has source 'banner.jpg', displayed size 1920x600px, alt text 'Promotional offer for new users', and loads within 500ms
Verify the overlay text 'Discover Our New Collection' is centered horizontally and vertically at x 0, y 0, has type size 48px, text weight 700, and foreground color #FFFFFF

Verify the 'Shop Now' button below the text has background color #FF5722, text color #FFFFFF, padding 16px 32px, border radius 8px, and its bounding box is aligned at bottom 100px relative to the image

Verify the 'Add to Cart' button displays content 'Add to Cart', has font size 18px, typeface 'Inter', font weight 600, fill color #4CAF50, ink color #FFFFFF, a 2px solid transparent border, corner curvature 4px, and inner spacing 12px 24px
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is enabled
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button, when focused, shows a 300ms transition on background color to #66BB6A
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button has horizontal extent 200px, vertical extent 48px, and accessibility label 'Add product to shopping cart'
Locate the search input field
Verify its prompt text is 'Search for products...', its initial value is empty, and it has a 1px solid border of color #CCCCCC with border radius 4px
Verify its padding is 10px 12px, margin-bottom 20px, width 300px, and height 40px
Verify the search input field is enabled
Verify the search input field, when focused, its border color changes to #007BFF
Verify the associated text 'Search' is positioned immediately above the input field with text alignment left
Navigate to the main menu
Verify the 'About Us' navigation item displays text 'About Us', has color #333333, font size 16px, font weight 500, and padding 10px 15px
Verify the 'About Us' navigation item is visible

Verify the 'About Us' navigation item top-left corner is at x 100, y 50, its width is 150px, and height 40px
Verify the avatar image has source 'profile_pic.png', rendered dimensions 80x80px, natural dimensions 150x150px, and alt text 'User profile picture'
Verify the avatar image has border radius 50% (circular), a 2px solid border in #DDDDDD, and loads within 300ms
Verify the avatar image opacity is 1, it is visible, and its center is positioned at x 200, y 100
Verify the pagination component displays exactly 5 page numbers
Verify each page number link has foreground color #007BFF, background color transparent, type size 14px, border radius 3px, and padding 6px 10px

Verify the currently active/selected page has background color #007BFF and text color #FFFFFF
Verify each pagination item has margin-right 4px, width 30px, height 30px, and the entire component is horizontally aligned to the center
Click the 'Open Modal' button
Verify the modal dialog becomes visible, has width 500px, height 300px, background color #FFFFFF, and opacity 1
Verify the modal dialog uses a 'fade-in' animation of 300ms duration, has z-index 1000, and is centered at x 50% (relative to viewport), y 50%
Verify the modal dialog border radius is 8px, padding 20px, and the main heading text 'Confirmation' is present
